sec.title: Internal operator cab or operator canopy lighting and access lighting
sec.p: The operator cab shall be fitted with a fixed inner lighting system that shall be able to function with the engine stopped, so that it is possible to illuminate the operator's station such that the operator's manual can be read. This is not required for underground rigs.
Access illumination shall be provided in accordance with ISOÂ 2867.

non-normative-note.label: NOTE
non-normative-note.p: This includes lighting up the ladder, pathway on the machine and the ground next to the machine.
